cs3500.music.model

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs3500.music.model.Note
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Note>

    public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Note>
    Representation of an individual music note on a pitch. Stores basic information such as start beat and end beat (inclusive). Implements comparable to allow for sorting.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Note(int start, int end)
      Constructs an instance of a Note.
      Note(int start, int end, int instrument, int loudness)
      Construct a note with start, end, instrument, and loudness.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note(int start,
            int end)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an instance of a Note.
        Parameters:
        start - the start beat of the note (inclusive)
        end - the end beat of the note (exclusive)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if start or end are < 0, or if end <= start

      • Note

        public Note(int start,
            int end,
            int instrument,
            int loudness)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Construct a note with start, end, instrument, and loudness.
        Parameters:
        start - beat to start at
        end - beat to end at
        instrument - the instrument being played
        loudness - the loudness to play at
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if start < 0, end < 0, end <= start, instrument < 1, loudness < 0, loudness > 100
